title: Lynda.com - Final Cut Pro 6 Essential Editing
description:
Final Cut Pro is part of the Final Cut Studio suite of applications by Apple <a href="
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.apple.com/finalcutstudio/</a>


Video Tutorial

Final Cut Pro 6 Essential Editing
with: Larry Jordan


Starting with his system for getting organized and ending with final output, Apple Certified Trainer Larry Jordan covers all the details of creating and editing with Final Cut Pro 6 Essential Editing. He provides an in-depth overview of the application and its interface, and demonstrates how to plan, create, edit, and export professional digital video projects. Exercise files accompany the tutorials.


Topics include:

Introduction
Getting organized
Getting started
Learning the interface
Building your story
Using subclips
Using markers
Organizing your story
Trimming your story
Multiclip editing
Using transitions
Editing audio
Mixing audio
Capturing
Outputting to tape
Importing
Exporting
Managing media


For more info: <a href=" http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=430" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://movielibrary.lynda.com/html/modPage.asp?ID=430</a>


Note: I also have the followup to this tutorial called FCP6 Essential Effects, and will upload that, as Larry would say, next :)

Hope you enjoy!
